784 
WGUS83 KLBF 071543
FLSLBF
FLOOD STATEMENT 
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE NORTH PLATTE NE 
1043 AM CDT SAT JUN 7 2014

...THE FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES FOR THE FOLLOWING RIVERS IN 
NEBRASKA...

SOUTH PLATTE RIVER NEAR ROSCOE AFFECTING DEUEL AND KEITH COUNTIES.
  
.THE SOUTH PLATTE RIVER CONTINUES TO RISE ACROSS WESTERN NEBRASKA 
DUE TO A COMBINATION OF SNOWMELT RUNOFF FROM THE MOUNTAINS AND 
RECENT HEAVY RAINFALL. THE RIVER IS FORECAST TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD 
STAGE EARLY SUNDAY AND WILL STAY ABOVE FLOOD STAGE THROUGH THE MIDDLE
OF NEXT WEEK. THE RIVER IS FORECAST TO CREST BETWEEN 9.0 AND 9.5 FT
MONDAY MORNING.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

SAFETY MESSAGE...STAY TUNED FOR FURTHER DEVELOPMENTS BY LISTENING TO 
NOAA WEATHER RADIO...RADIO AND TELEVISION STATIONS OR ONLINE AT 
WWW.WEATHER.GOV/NORTHPLATTE.

&&

NEC049-101-081543-
/O.EXT.KLBF.FL.W.0002.140608T1000Z-000000T0000Z/
/RSON1.1.RS.140608T1000Z.140609T0600Z.000000T0000Z.NO/
943 AM MDT SAT JUN 7 2014

THE FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES FOR
  THE SOUTH PLATTE RIVER NEAR ROSCOE.
* FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.
* AT  8:30 AM SATURDAY THE STAGE WAS 8.1 FEET. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 9.0 FEET. 
* MINOR FLOODING IS FORECAST.
* FORECAST...RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE BY EARLY TOMORROW AND CONTINUE TO
  RISE TO NEAR 9.3 FEET BY MONDAY MORNING. THEN SLOWLY FALL 
  THEREAFTER.
* IMPACT...AT 9.0 FEET...FLOOD STAGE. MINOR FLOODING OF AGRICULTURAL 
  LAND ALONG THE RIVER. 

&&

LAT...LON 4111 10170 4114 10170 4114 10135 4110 10135
